template<class T>
uint32 MC2ArrayAllocator< T >::getTotalNbrElements (   )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Returns the total number of elements, i.e.

the total size that should be allocated to avoid using single alloc. Function only works if no addElements have been run on the block allocated.

Implements AbstractMC2Allocator.

void MC2ArrayAllocator< T >::reallocate (  int  n  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Sets new size.

Should only be called once, since it destroys all data inside.
